The message that Christ bore we are to bear. There is a satisfaction of soul that all may have,--a sanctification that will reveal the outworking of the principles of truth in the daily life. It rests with us individually to place ourselves where God can give us this sanctification. We are to reveal 


                                     -344- 

the purity of character that Christ revealed, that we may set a right example before those who are seeking the right way. . . .
